//Door open whitaker's opening

//alarm door open





response C1M2GrabbingColaManager
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/Orator_Blank.vcd"  then Manager C1M2GrabbingCola2 ManagerActor:1 0 // [BLANK]	
}

rule C1M2GrabbingColaManager
{
	criteria ConceptC1M2GrabbingCola PanicEventManager
	ApplyContext "C1M2AlarmSetoff:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	response C1M2GrabbingColaManager
}


response C1M2GrabbingColaNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/Orator_Blank.vcd"  then NamVet C1M2GrabbingCola2 NamVetActor:1 0 // [BLANK]	
}

rule C1M2GrabbingColaNamVet
{
	criteria ConceptC1M2GrabbingCola PanicEventNamVet
	ApplyContext "C1M2AlarmSetoff:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	response C1M2GrabbingColaNamVet
}

{							    
	scene "scenes/npcs/Orator_Blank.vcd"  then Biker C1M2GrabbingCola2 BikerActor:1 0 // [BLANK]	
}

{
	criteria ConceptC1M2GrabbingCola PanicEventBiker
	ApplyContext "C1M2AlarmSetoff:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	response C1M2GrabbingColaBiker
}

	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3BridgeLeapGOrator
}
Response C7M3BridgeLeapPOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3BridgeLeapSpeakProducer foo:0 0.05 //
}

{
	criteria ConceptC7M3BridgeLeap PanicEventProducer Ismapc7m3_port
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3BridgeLeapPOrator

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// finales_dlc2
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// GENERAL CRITERIA
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

criterion "ChurchGuyPhase1" "worldChurchguyPhase" "<1" required		//Used to gate churchguy far babbling
criterion "ChurchGuyPhase2" "worldChurchguyPhase2" "<1" required		//Used to gate churchguy close babbling
criterion "ChurchguyPhase3" "worldChurchguyPhase3" "<1" required		//Used to gate churchguy button press speech
criterion "FrancisTriedCopGambit" "worldFrancisTriedCopGambit" "=1" required		//Francis tried the cop gambit
criterion "BoatPhase1" "worldBoatPhase1" "<1" required		//Used to gate boat couple initial attract announcement cycle
criterion "NotAmandaScene1" "worldAmandaScene1" "<1" required		//Gate for Amanda boradcast loop response
criterion "NotAmandaScene2" "worldAmandaScene2" "<1" required		//Gate for Amanda boradcast loop response
criterion "NotAmandaScene3" "worldAmandaScene3" "<1" required		//Gate for Amanda boradcast loop response
criterion "NotAmandaScene4" "worldAmandaScene4" "<1" required		//Gate for Amanda boradcast loop response
criterion "BoatPhase2" "worldBoatPhase2" "<1" required		//Used to gate boat couple button press 1
criterion "BoatIntransit1" "worldBoatIntransit" "<1" required		//First boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit2" "worldBoatIntransit" "=1" required		//Second boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit3" "worldBoatIntransit" "=2" required		//Third boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit4" "worldBoatIntransit" "=3" required		//Fourth boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit5" "worldBoatIntransit" "=4" required		//Fifth boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit6" "worldBoatIntransit" "=5" required		//Sixth boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit7" "worldBoatIntransit" "=6" required		//Seventh boat finale breather
criterion "BoatIntransit8" "worldBoatIntransit" "=7" required		//Eighth boat finale breather
criterion "ChanceToFire25Percent" "randomnum" "<=25" required		//25% chance
criterion "ExtraWeight10" "randomnum" ">=0" required weight 10 		//Add 10 extra weight to a rule
criterion "BoatWaiting" "worldBoatLeaving" "<1" required		//Set to 1 when the boat pulls out of the dock
criterion "PlaneLoop1" "worldPlaneLoop1" "<1" required		//Used to gate planeguy initial attract loop
criterion "PlaneLoop2" "worldPlaneLoop2" "<1" required		//Used to gate planeguy button 2 nag
criterion "PlaneLoop3" "worldPlaneLoop3" "<1" required		//Used to gate "GET TO THE PLANE!" loop.
criterion "ChurchguyTurnLoop" "worldChurchguyTurnLoop" "<1" required		//Used to gate the churchguy turning into a zombie loop
criterion "FarmPhase2" "worldFarmPhase2" "<1" required		//Used to gate farm button1 loop
criterion "FarmPhase3" "worldFarmPhase3" "<1" required		//Used to gate farm button2 loop
criterion "PlaneIntransit1" "worldPlaneIntransit" "<1" required		//First Plane finale breather
criterion "PlaneIntransit2" "worldPlaneIntransit" "=1" required		//2nd Plane finale breather
criterion "PlaneIntransit3" "worldPlaneIntransit" "=2" required		//3rd Plane finale breather
criterion "PlaneIntransit4" "worldPlaneIntransit" "=3" required		//4th Plane finale breather
criterion "PlaneIntransit5" "worldPlaneIntransit" "=4" required		//5th Plane finale breather
criterion "IsTouchedDoor" "worldTouchedDoor" "=1" required		//Gates churchguy trigger


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// BOAT FINALE
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Gambler hits radio button first time
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	criterion "ConceptBlock514" "Concept" "boat_radio_button1" required
	response ConceptBlock514Gambler
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/boatman_blank.vcd"  then  Gambler ConceptBlock515 foo:0 .05    // [BLANK]
	}
	rule ConceptBlock514Gambler
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock514 BoatPhase2 PanicEventGambler
		ApplyContext "BoatPhase1:1:5000"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock514Gambler
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock515" "Concept" "ConceptBlock515" required
	response ConceptBlock515Gambler
	{
		scene "scenes/Gambler/LostCall01.vcd"   then orator_boat_radio ConceptBlock522 foo:0  0.01 //Helloooo?
		scene "scenes/Gambler/LostCall04.vcd"   then orator_boat_radio ConceptBlock522 foo:0  0.01 //Can you guys hear me?
	}
	rule ConceptBlock515Gambler
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock515 BoatPhase2 isGAMBLER
		response ConceptBlock515Gambler
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Mechanic hits radio button first time
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	// USES PREVIOUSLY DEFINED CONCEPT: criterion "ConceptBlock514" "Concept" "boat_radio_button1" required
	response ConceptBlock516Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/boatman_blank.vcd"  then  Mechanic ConceptBlock517 foo:0 .05    // [BLANK]
	}
	rule ConceptBlock516Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock514 BoatPhase2 PanicEventMechanic
		ApplyContext "BoatPhase1:1:5000"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock516Mechanic
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock517" "Concept" "ConceptBlock517" required
	response ConceptBlock517Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldC5M4B12.vcd"   then orator_boat_radio ConceptBlock522 foo:0  0.01 //Hello there!
	}
	rule ConceptBlock517Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock517 BoatPhase2 isMECHANIC
		response ConceptBlock517Mechanic
	}

		scene "scenes/Producer/LostCall04.vcd"   then orator_boat_radio ConceptBlock522 foo:0  0.01 //Can  you guys here me?
	}
	rule ConceptBlock519Producer
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock519 BoatPhase2 isPRODUCER
		response ConceptBlock519Producer
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// CHURCH FINALE
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Mechanic presses the churchguy button
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	criterion "ConceptBlock008" "Concept" "churchguy_button" required
	response ConceptBlock008Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/churchguy_radioinitialbroadcast13.vcd"   then  Mechanic ConceptBlock009 foo:0 .05    // Who's there?
	}
	rule ConceptBlock008Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock008 PanicEventMechanic ChurchguyPhase3
		ApplyContext "ChurchguyPhase3:1:100,ChurchguyPhase2:1:100,WarnMegaMob:1:100,SaidSafeSpotAhead:1:120,Talk:1:20,TouchedDoor:1:0"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock008Mechanic
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock009" "Concept" "ConceptBlock009" required
	response ConceptBlock009Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldC5M4B15.vcd"   then  churchguy ConceptBlock011 foo:0 -4.542 // Well shit, I'm Ellis. I got Rochelle here with me, Coach and Nick.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock009Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock009  isMECHANIC
		response ConceptBlock009Mechanic
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Coach responds to Churchguy ringing the bell
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	criterion "ConceptBlock012" "Concept" "ConceptNuttier" required
	response ConceptBlock012Coach
	{
		scene "scenes/Coach/DLC1_C6M1_WeddingWitchDead01.vcd"     // You got problems boy. Deep down problems.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock012Coach
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock012 IsCoach
		response ConceptBlock012Coach
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Mechanic responds to Churchguy ringing the bell
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	// USES PREVIOUSLY DEFINED CONCEPT: criterion "ConceptBlock012" "Concept" "ConceptNuttier" required
	response ConceptBlock013Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/Mechanic/DLC1_C6M3_SafeRoomConvo23.vcd"     // I will kill him.
		scene "scenes/Mechanic/DLC1_C6M3_SafeRoomConvo24.vcd"     // He is a dead man.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock013Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock012 IsMechanic
		response ConceptBlock013Mechanic
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Coach presses the churchguy button
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	// USES PREVIOUSLY DEFINED CONCEPT: criterion "ConceptBlock008" "Concept" "churchguy_button" required
	response ConceptBlock014Coach
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/churchguy_radiobutton101.vcd"   then  Coach ConceptBlock015 foo:0 .05    // No one gets in here until I know you're immune!
		scene "scenes/npcs/churchguy_radiobutton1extended34.vcd"   then  Coach ConceptBlock015 foo:0 .05    // I'm not letting you in until I'm sure you're immune.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock014Coach
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock008 PanicEventCoach ChurchguyPhase3
		ApplyContext "ChurchguyPhase3:1:100,ChurchguyPhase2:1:100,WarnMegaMob:1:100,SaidSafeSpotAhead:1:120,Talk:1:20,TouchedDoor:1:0"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock014Coach
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock015" "Concept" "ConceptBlock015" required
	response ConceptBlock015Coach
	{
		scene "scenes/Coach/WorldC5M5B12.vcd"   then  churchguy ConceptBlock016 foo:0 -3.936 // We are NOT infected.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock015Coach
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock015  isCOACH
		response ConceptBlock015Coach
	}

		response ConceptBlock585Producer
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Mechanic Presses farm radio button second time
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	criterion "ConceptBlock587" "Concept" "farm_radio_button2" required
	response ConceptBlock587Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/soldier_blank.vcd"  then Mechanic ConceptBlock588 foo:0  .05    // [BLANK]
	}
	rule ConceptBlock587Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock587 PanicEventMechanic
		ApplyContext "FarmPhase2:1:5000,SaidRadioTriggered:1:500"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock587Mechanic
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock588" "Concept" "ConceptBlock588" required
	response ConceptBlock588Mechanic
	{
		scene "scenes/Mechanic/MoveOn01.vcd"   then  orator_farm_radio ConceptBlock589 foo:0 0.01 //Let's go.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock588Mechanic
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock588  isMECHANIC
		ApplyContext "FarmPhase2:1:5000"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock588Mechanic
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Gambler Presses farm radio button second time
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	// USES PREVIOUSLY DEFINED CONCEPT: criterion "ConceptBlock587" "Concept" "farm_radio_button2" required
	response ConceptBlock591Gambler
	{
		scene "scenes/npcs/soldier_blank.vcd"  then Gambler ConceptBlock592 foo:0  .05    // [BLANK]
	}
	rule ConceptBlock591Gambler
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock587 PanicEventGambler
		ApplyContext "FarmPhase2:1:5000,SaidRadioTriggered:1:500"
		ApplyContextToWorld
		response ConceptBlock591Gambler
	}

	criterion "ConceptBlock592" "Concept" "ConceptBlock592" required
	response ConceptBlock592Gambler
	{
		scene "scenes/Gambler/MoveOn05.vcd"   then  orator_farm_radio ConceptBlock589 foo:0 0.01 //Let's go.
	}
	rule ConceptBlock592Gambler
	{
		criteria ConceptBlock592  isGAMBLER
		response ConceptBlock592Gambler
	}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Coach Presses farm radio button second time
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	// USES PREVIOUSLY DEFINED CONCEPT: criterion "ConceptBlock587" "Concept" "farm_radio_button2" required

		response ConceptBlock594Coach

{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReactionPositive06.vcd"  //Ah haha right!
	//scene "scenes/Manager/WorldC2M5B102.vcd"  //They nailed this damn song!

{
	criteria ConceptRemark IsNamVet IsWorldC1M1First IsNotSaidWorldC1M1First IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsSubjectNear300 AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "SaidWorldC1M1First:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerRemarkWorldC1M1FirstNamVet
}



Response C1M1InSmokeNamVet
{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough01.vcd"  then any C1M1Cough foo:0 -1.560 //[Coughing from smoke]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough02.vcd"  then any C1M1Cough foo:0 -2.621 //[Coughing from smoke]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough04.vcd"  then any C1M1Cough foo:0 -1.145 //[Coughing from smoke]
}

{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsNamVet IsSaidC1M1InSmoke ismap_c1m1_hotel AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	Response C1M1InSmokeNamVet
}

{
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough01.vcd"  then all C1M1Cough foo:0 -1.560 //[Coughing from smoke]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough02.vcd"  then all C1M1Cough foo:0 -2.621 //[Coughing from smoke]
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Cough04.vcd"  then all C1M1Cough foo:0 -1.145 //[Coughing from smoke]
}

	ApplyContext "SaidC1M1InSmoke:1:30,Talk:0:0"

}

Response C2M5_Button2YellBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionPositive03.vcd"  //Rock n Roll!
	//scene "scenes/Biker/WorldC2M5B26.vcd"  //I love this song!
	//scene "scenes/Biker/WorldC2M5B28.vcd"  //It's like we're roadies for the Midnight Riders!

{

Response C5M2AlarmNagTeenGirl
{
	scene "scenes/TeenGirl/EmphaticRun04.vcd"  //TURN OFF THE ALARM!
	scene "scenes/TeenGirl/EmphaticRun09.vcd"  //KEEP RUNNING!
	scene "scenes/TeenGirl/EmphaticRun10.vcd"  //GET TO THE ALARM!
	scene "scenes/TeenGirl/EmphaticRun12.vcd"  //TURN IT OFF!
}
Rule C5M2AlarmNagTeenGirl
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsTeenGirl IsMapc5m2_park AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival ChanceToFire80Percent _auto_IsAlarmOn _auto_NotAlarmOff _auto_NotDoorOpen _auto_NotTimerLockA _auto_NotTimerLockTeenGirl IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockTeenGirl:1:13"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C5M2AlarmNagTeenGirl
}

{
	scene "scenes/Mechanic/EllisStoriesK01.vcd"  then Producer PlayerAirportIntrozb foo:0 0.01  //Keith top of building.
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldAirport0104.vcd"  //That plane's headed right for the airport. I say we head there too.
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldAirport0106.vcd"  then Producer IntroAirport01zb foo:0 0 //I sure as hell wouldn't mind flyin' outta here. Let's head to the airport.
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldAirport0107.vcd"  //That plane's headed for the airport and the airport ain't far from here. If nobody's got a better idea, I say we head for the airport too.
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/WorldAirport0114.vcd"  then Producer IntroAirport01zb foo:0 0 //That plane's headed right for the airport. I say we head there too.
}

{
	criteria ConceptIntroAirport IsMechanic
	ApplyContext "talk:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerAirportIntroMechanic
}

{
	scene "scenes/Mechanic/EmphaticGo04.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Hey man we gotta go!
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/ArrivePlane01.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get to the plane. Let's go!
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/ArrivePlane02.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get to the plane!
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/ArrivePlane02.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get to the plane!
	//scene "scenes/Mechanic/ArrivePlaneInitial01.vcd" odds 5 then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //This is the last flight out of here! Let's go
}

{
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsMechanic isrunway IsNotSaidFinalVehicleArrived
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalVehicleArrived:1:20,Talk:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorFinalVehicleRunwayMechanic
}

Response Player.C7M3BridgeLeapGambler
{
	scene "scenes/Gambler/Taunt07.vcd"  //You don't stand a chance.
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE02.vcd"  //Don't get off the bridge, I have this.
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE03.vcd"  //Stay there! I got this!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE04.vcd"  //You take care.
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE05.vcd"  //Remember: Stay together! No matter what!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE06.vcd"  //Do not follow me!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE07.vcd"  //Nobody try to help me! I'm doing this alone!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE08.vcd"  //I'm not horseshittin' around, don't follow me!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE09.vcd"  //Take care of each other!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE10.vcd"  //Be safe! Get to the Keys!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE11.vcd"  //You guys mean everything to me! Stay there!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE12.vcd"  //You guys are the only family I got! Take care of each other!
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE13.vcd"  //Stay on the goddamn bridge, I have this.
	//scene "scenes/Gambler/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE14.vcd"  //No matter what happens: stay together.
}
Rule Player.C7M3BridgeLeapGambler
{
	criteria ConceptC7M3BridgeLeapSpeakGambler IsNotCoughing IsGambler  IsTalk IsTalkGambler IsNotSpeaking  ismapc7m3_port IsWorldTalkGambler IsNotScavenge _auto_NotSaidC7M3BridgeLeap
	ApplyContext "WarnMegaMob:1:300,SaidSpecialWarn:1:30,_auto_SaidC7M3BridgeLeap:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response Player.C7M3BridgeLeapGambler
}

// Finale Speech
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatGambler
{
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M101.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get on the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M102.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get on the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M103.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get to the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M4B23.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Everyone to the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M4B24.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //Get to the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC3M4B25.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //To the boat!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC4M4B22.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //GET TO THE BOAT!
	scene "scenes/Gambler/WorldC4M4B23.vcd"  then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 0 //GET TO THE BOAT!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatGambler
{
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsGambler ismap_l4d_smalltown05_houseboat IsNotSaidFinalVehicleArrived
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalVehicleArrived:1:20,Talk:1:3"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatGambler
}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// C7M1
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response C7M1OpenTankDoorProducer
{
	scene "scenes/Producer/HeardHulk01.vcd"  //Oh shit... Tank!
	//scene "scenes/Producer/C6DLC3OPENINGDOOR02.vcd"  //Door's opening, get ready...
	//scene "scenes/Producer/C6DLC3OPENINGDOOR04.vcd"  //I am so dead.
	//scene "scenes/Producer/C6DLC3OPENINGDOOR05.vcd"  //I cannot believe I am doing this.
	//scene "scenes/Producer/C6DLC3OPENINGDOOR06.vcd"  //Unbelievable. You guys are the biggest chickenshits.
}

{
	criteria Conceptc7m1opentankdoorspeakProducer IsProducer _auto_NotsaidC7M1OpenTankDoor
	ApplyContext "_auto_saidC7M1OpenTankDoor:1:10,_auto_saidC7M1OpenTankDoorLong:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld

}

	scene "scenes/Producer/MiscDirectional01.vcd"  //Through here!
	scene "scenes/Producer/MiscDirectional11.vcd"  //Let's go through here!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerRemarkSmalltown01_path08Producer
{
	criteria ConceptRemark IsProducer IsSmalltown01_path08 IsNotSaidSmalltown01_path08 IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkProducer IsSubjectNear200 IsWorldTalkProducer IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "SaidSmalltown01_path08:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerRemarkSmalltown01_path08Producer
}
